title: Putin's Info Iron Curtain
description:
Irina Borogan, and Andrei Soldatov, two Russian Journalists who have documented the Kremlin's war on the internet discuss the effectiveness of suppression of news in Russia, and Putin's strengths and failings as an information warrior. In the Spiel, mistaking the trend for the truth, plus Mike resigns from the Academy.
Produced by Joel Patterson and Corey Wara
Email us at thegist@mikepesca.com
